attributes.action: Give Dean Windass and Phil Brown of Hull city a MBE for geting Hull City afc in Premier League
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: they did it 104 year and never been in the top  league give the full team 1 or 2  but at 39 and to score at wembley for your home team deano it yours

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
